text: George Robert Wendt Jr. (October 17, 1948 â€“ May 20, 2025) was an American actor. He was known for his role as Norm Peterson in the comedy show Cheers. He also appeared in Michael Jackson's music video Black or White. He hosted his own show, The George Wendt Show, before it was cancelled in April 1995. Wendt was born in Chicago, Illinois. He was married to Bernadette Birkett from 1978 until his death. They had three children together and two step-children.
